I would give this response a grade of 85.

The response provides a clear and comprehensive overview of the concept of "house of God" in Scripture, covering both the Old and New Testaments. It effectively explores the biblical context and significance of this term, highlighting its connection to sacred places and sanctuaries where God dwells among His people.

While the response does not directly address the concern of clarifying the meaning and significance of "house of God", it provides a thorough treatment of the topic that would likely help readers understand the concept better. The only area for improvement is that the response could have more explicitly stated its conclusions about the significance of "house of God" in Scripture, rather than simply presenting historical context.

Overall, this is an excellent response that effectively explores the biblical concept of "house of God".
